.. _`design_system_components_persontile`:

PersonTile
==========

.. figure:: images/component_persontile.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

Component for displaying compact information on a person, including thumbnail, email and phone details.
Amongst other uses it can display person relations of an object, such as author, last edited etc.
